text: Stephanie Louise "Steph" Rice (born 17 June 1988) is a former Australian swimmer. She won three gold medals at the 2008 Summer Olympics in Beijing. She also competed at the 2012 Summer Olympics in London. She confirmed her retirement from competitive swimming on 9 April 2014. Rice was born in Brisbane, Queensland. In 2013, she won the third season of The Celebrity Apprentice Australia. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Stephanie Rice at Sports-Reference.com Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Olympic gold medalists for Australia Category:Australian swimmers Category:Medalists at the 2008 Summer Olympics Category:Order of Australia Category:Sportspeople from Brisbane Category:Reality television participants
title: Stephanie Rice
